page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: Isolated farms and cottages are the only dwellings. Some of these are no longer permanently occupied and are let as holiday dwellings. Some people work in Winchcombe or in Cheltenham, and, remote farm cottages have begun to attract people who want to live in a quiet place. Most people who live here are engaged in farming but farming now offers employment to fewer people and the vacant accomodation is taken up by people who work elsewhere. There are fewer than thirty adult voters recorded on the electorial system.
